scripts.build: prisma generate && prisma db push && npm run build:css && remix build
scripts.dev: prisma generate && concurrently "npm run dev:css" "npm run dev:s3" "npm run pscale:connect" "remix dev"
scripts.pscale:current-branches: pscale branch list millmanphotography -f json | jq -r ['.[].name']
scripts.pscale:current-branch: branch=`git branch --show-current` ; if [[ `npm run pscale:current-branches` == *"$branch"* ]]; then echo "$branch"; else echo 'main'; fi
scripts.pscale:branch:create: branch=`git branch --show-current` ; if [[ `npm run pscale:current-branches` != *"$branch"* ]]; then pscale branch create millmanphotography $branch; else echo "PlanetScale branch already exists for $branch"; fi
scripts.pscale:connect: branch=`branch=\`git branch --show-current\` ; if [[ \`npm run pscale:current-branches\` == *"$branch"* ]]; then echo "$branch"; else echo 'main'; fi` ; pscale connect millmanphotography $branch --port 3309
scripts.pscale:deploy:request: pscale deploy-request create millmanphotography `npm run pscale:current-branch`
